data.name: Sample - Securonix SNYPR - 2.0.1
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Securonix SNYPR" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Workflows
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all existing workflows from Securonix SNYPR.

workflows.name: Create Incident
workflows.description: Create new incident in Securonix SNYPR platform based on specified input parameter. If case is created or present then return existing incident details.

params.actionName: Mark as concern and create incident

workflows.name: Get Default
workflows.description: Get default assignee for specified workflow from Securonix SNYPR.

workflows.name: List All Peer Groups
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all peer groups from Securonix SNYPR.

workflows.name: Custom Query
workflows.description: Runs a search on Securonix SNYPR and retrieves details based on the query attributes and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Query Users
workflows.description: Retrieves details of all users or specific users from Securonix SNYPR based on the query attributes that you have specified.

workflows.name: Query Watchlist
workflows.description: Retrieves details of all watchlists or specific watchlists from Securonix SNYPR based on the query attributes that you have specified.

workflows.name: List All Resource Groups
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all resource groups from Securonix SNYPR.

workflows.name: Get Available Threat Action
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all available threat actions from Securonix SNYPR.

workflows.name: Get Incident Status
workflows.description: Retrieves the status of a specific incident from Securonix SNYPR based on the incident ID you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Incident Workflow
workflows.description: Retrieves the workflow of a specific incident from Securonix SNYPR based on the incident ID you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Possible Actions for Incident
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all possible actions associated with a specific incident from Securonix SNYPR based on the incident ID you have specified.

arguments.title: Securonix-snypr: Get Possible Actions for Incident

routes.name: Start -> Get Possible Actions for Incident

workflows.name: Get Risk Score
workflows.description: Retrieves risk scores for all users or risk scores from Securonix SNYPRbased on the query attributes and other input parameters that you have specified.

params.query: employeeid = "1001" and policyname="Local accounts created on windows"

workflows.name: List Incidents
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of incidents from the Securonix SNYPR platform based on the range type, date range, and other filter parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: List All Policies
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all policies from Securonix SNYPR.

workflows.name: List Users
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all users from Securonix SNYPR.

workflows.name: Query Third Party Intelligence
workflows.description: Retrieves details of all TPIs or specific TPIs from Securonix SNYPR based on the query attributes that you have specified.

workflows.name: Check Task on Incident
workflows.description: Checks if the action that you have specified is allowed on the specified Securonix SNYPR incident based on the incident ID and action name you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Incident Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details of a specific incident from Securonix SNYPR based on the incident ID you have specified.

workflows.name: Query Violations
workflows.description: Retrieves details of all violations or specific violations from Securonix SNYPR based on the query attributes and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Risk History
workflows.description: Retrieves risk history for all users or risk history from Securonix SNYPR based on the query attributes and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Top Threats
workflows.description: Retrieves the top threats from Securonix SNYPR based on when the threat was last seen and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Take Action on Incident
workflows.description: Takes a specified action on a Securonix SNYPR incident based on the incident ID, action, and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Top Violations
workflows.description: Retrieves the top violations from Securonix SNYPR based on when the violation was last seen and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Top Violators
workflows.description: Retrieves the top violators from Securonix SNYPR based on when the violator was last seen and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Add Comment
workflows.description: Adds a comment on a Securonix SNYPR incident based on the incident ID you have specified.
